articles.title: Adam Kinzinger: Social media should address spike in online threats
articles.description: Rep. Adam Kinzinger spoke with CNN Friday about how the far-right has amped up threats against the FBI amid the search of Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago.
articles.content:
Republican Rep. Adam Kinzinger on Friday suggested social media companies should be more proactive against violent threats made online.

articles.title: Zelenskyy warns world is on 'verge of nuclear disaster'; More explosions reported at Russian military sites
